headline: Palo Alto Networks AI Security Push Tests Investor Patience And Valuation
summary: Palo Alto Networks (NasdaqGS:PANW) has agreed to acquire CyberArk and Koi Security to expand its AI security capabilities and unify its platform. The company announced new technology partnerships, including Nvidia, to embed its security platform into industrial systems. Alongside these moves, Palo Alto Networks reported Q2 FY2026 results and raised full year revenue guidance, while flagging higher near term integration costs and lower profit guidance. Palo Alto Networks, trading around...
